title: LF Support plat 4 +
body:
Looking for a support that is willing to duo and work together as a lane, as well as play ranked 5's frequently with my team. 

Add me in game with any further questions.

FortunateDesires

replies.body:
Hey man, I'm up for a game or two to see if we sync. Will add you in game.
IGN: KItty Katt
